Articles.Content:
I know it hasn't been long, but as I said in my other post, 

> 
> .
> I have decided to stop posting for at least 6 months (or until my family... issues are sorted out)

They're solved!

To quote the glorious and eternal Bender Bending Rodriguez- 

"I'm back baby!"

Ken
Yeah, in time for 1.0! Join the hype train!
